text: A Hole in the Head is a 1959 American comedy-drama movie directed by Frank Capra and was based on the 1957 play by Arthur Schulman. It stars Frank Sinatra, Edward G. Robinson, Eleanor Parker, Keenan Wynn, Carolyn Jones, Thelma Ritter, Dub Taylor, Eddie Hodges, Connie Sawyer and was distributed by United Artists. It won an Academy Award in 1960. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1959 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Frank Capra Category:Movies set in hotels Category:Movies set in Miami
title: A Hole in the Head
